description: A stout firefighter's belt.  Useful for keeping your bunker gear up, it also doubles as an equipment belt with a reinforced loop for holding a large tool.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising a master.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising a strong intermediate.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising a near-master.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising an intermediate.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising a fresh intermediate.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising a novice.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A belt worn by martial arts practitioners, advertising a moderate novice.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A broad, black obi gi.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A 2-inch nylon webbing belt commonly used by military forces.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
